Txt_Bank_Message_Start_Bar.Text: *: Welcome to the Rainbow's End Bank!

Txt_Bank_Message_First_01_Bar.Text: *: You can trust us to keep your hard-earned money safe!

Txt_Bank_Message_First_02_Bar.Text: *: Deposits and withdrawals are accepted in multiples of one hundred gold coins.

Txt_Bank_Message_First_03_Bar.Text: *: And, of course, our services are entirely complimentary!

Txt_Bank_Message_First_04_Bar.Text: *: So, how can I help you today, {LEADER}?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_TopBalance_Bar.Text: *: Your balance currently stands at {VALUE} gold coins. How may I be of service today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_TopNoBalance_Bar.Text: *: You don't currently have any gold coins in your account. How may I be of service today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_TopBalanceAgain_Bar.Text: *: Your balance currently stands at {VALUE} gold coins. Is there any other way I can be of service?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_TopNoBalanceAgain_Bar.Text: *: You don't currently have any gold coins in your account. Is there any other way I can be of service?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_GoldShortage_Bar.Text: *: I'm very sorry, but you don't seem to have that many gold coins with you...

Txt_Bank_Message_DepositCannot_Bar.Text: *: I'm very sorry, but our vault is full, so we can't accept any more deposits just now.

Txt_Bank_Message_DepositTop_Bar.Text: *: We accept deposits in increments of one hundred gold coins. How much would you like to deposit today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_Deposit_Bar.Text: *: {VALUE} gold coins? Very well. We'll keep them safe and sound in our vault for you!

Txt_Bank_Message_GoldMax_Bar.Text: *: I'm afraid you can't carry that much.

Txt_Bank_Message_WithdrawCannot_Bar.Text: *: I'm very sorry, but you don't appear to have any gold coins deposited with us just now.

Txt_Bank_Message_WithdrawTop_Bar.Text: *: Your balance currently stands at {VALUE} gold coins. How much would you like to withdraw today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bank_Message_Withdraw_Bar.Text:
*: {VALUE} gold coins? My pleasure!
Here you go!

Txt_Bank_Message_Cancel_Bar.Text: *: Will that be all for today?

Txt_Bank_Message_FinishBalance_Bar.Text: *: Your balance currently stands at {VALUE} gold coins. Thank you for banking with Rainbow's End!

Txt_Bank_Message_FinishNoBalance_Bar.Text: *: You don't currently have any funds deposited with us, but we hope to serve you soon!
